ygData.messageBody:
On May 1, 1999 Calyn Dawnwatcher wrote:

>>If I were buying only one, it would be Shock of Ice. Bolts do have their
place, and I regret waiting so long to buy some good ones, but they can
miss or be blocked and in my opinion that is just too risky. When you
first get the level new spells will use too much of your mana for you to
want to risk any failures. Save up for a bolt, it will be VERY useful at
L10 or L11.<<

I totally agree. I bought Shock of Ice when a higher level wizard recommended
that's what I do. I'm level 9 currently and others in groups I"ve hunted with have
been impressed with the spell that does 35 damage in one hit (yeah I know it's
not much but I'm still little <G>)...especially spellcasters who aren't wizards
and can't get the spell. I'm still saving to get the rest of my level 8 spells..
including fire bolt.

Good luck!

Iggie
Level 9 Gnome Wizard
Cazic-Thule
